issue.title: file INSTALL fails with default CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX

message.raw: I ran into the same problem installing the point cloud libraries this morning. Because the problem seems specific to the way I have my system is setup, I'm going to assume its not a general issue and therfore a non-issue.
message.html: I ran into the same problem installing the point cloud libraries this morning. Because the problem seems specific to the way I have my system is setup, I'm going to assume its not a general issue and therfore a non-issue.
